mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_file(num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES (board_file_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, downCount , to_char(regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd am hh:mi') as regdate FROM board_file WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, downCount , to_char(regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd am hh:mi') as regdate FROM board_file ORDER BY num DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT X.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, downCount , to_char(regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd am hh:mi') as regdate FROM board_file ORDER BY num DESC) X ) WHERE rnum between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
